thread.title: HEALTH Release New Remix Album Ft. Purity Ring, Preoccupations, More: Listen
thread.title_full: HEALTH Release New Remix Album Ft. Purity Ring, Preoccupations, More: Listen

author: Pitchfork
title: HEALTH Release New Remix Album Ft. Purity Ring, Preoccupations, More: Listen
text:
Open share drawer HEALTH Release New Remix Album Ft. Purity Ring, Preoccupations, More: Listen The band marked the released of DISCO3 with an absurd “Reverse Telethon” hosted by Pauly Shore Photo by Sesse Lind 
HEALTH have released a new remix album, DISCO3 (via Loma Vista ). It features reworked versions of Death Magic tracks by Preoccupations, Purity Ring, Born in Flamez, Vessel, and more. It also has three new songs “because every remix records needs bangers,” HEALTH’s Jake Duzsik said in a statement. Listen to DISCO3 below. 
The band announced the album’s release with a “ Reverse Telethon ,” hosted by Pauly Shore on Funny or Die ’s Facebook. In the video, band reps called back fans who had previously called HEALTH at a number posted on social media and in videos like “ L.A. Looks .” There are also interviews with the band, absurd clips, and more. Check it out below. 
Watch HEALTH perform “New Coke” at Primavera 2015, via Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
